General.Name: RioCan Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: RioCan is one of Canada's largest real estate investment trusts. RioCan owns, manages and develops retail-focused, increasingly mixed-use properties located in prime, high-density transit-oriented areas where Canadians want to shop, live and work. As at June 30, 2023, our portfolio is comprised of 193 properties with an aggregate net leasable area of approximately 33.5 million square feet (at RioCan's interest) including office, residential rental and 11 development properties.
General.Address: RioCan Yonge Eglinton Centre, Toronto, ON, Canada, M4P 1E4
